value.name: Harris, Brevin Lamar
value.description: Brevin Lamar Harris, two months, of Chattanooga, passed away peacefully on Tuesday, May 25, 2021, in his parents’ arms in a local hospital. Brevin experienced holding hands, hugging, and kissing from his mommy and daddy while listening as they sang him songs and emphasized how much they loved him an uncountable number of times.

value.name: Driver in wrong-way Florida crash that left siblings dead had 200-page criminal history, police say
value.description: Volusia County Sheriff Mike Chitwood announced Monday that Reginald Lamar Harris, 47, was the driver who struck the vehicle carrying siblings Domynick and Danycka Milis on Interstate-95 in Daytona ...

value.name: Police: Detroit men threatened Georgia school to distract from robbery
value.description: DOUGLASVILLE, Ga. - Police have arrested three Detroit men accused of coming to Georgia to rob a Douglasville jewelry store. Officials say the "smash and grab" robbery happened at the Ice ...
